text: 7.34 Luk 10.40 Anɨgek, ne gos omɨŋal nɨgup. Pen bin pɨñ okok sek bin bɨ sek ma mɨdebal okok sek, kɨli Bɨawl tap ne okok gos nɨgel amub. Gos abe mubwak abe nop nep ñɨnɨg, Bɨawl mɨdeb ak am yonɨgun agɨl nepal. Bin bɨ dup olap pen, ne tap lum awl ak gos awl nɨgek amek, tɨtay gen bɨyad ak nop tep gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl nɨgup.
